All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CourseException
Exception related to course operations in the gym manager application.
CourseException.CourseFullException
Thrown when a course has reached its full capacity.
CourseException.CourseNotFoundException
Thrown when a course with the specified ID is not found.
CourseException.InvalidCourseDataException
Thrown when invalid data is provided for a course.
CourseRepository
Interface for managing gym courses in the repository.
CourseRepositoryImpl
Implementation of CourseRepository for managing gym courses in the repository.
CourseService
Interface for managing gym courses.
CourseServiceImpl
Implementation of the CourseService interface for managing gym courses.
CourseUI
CourseUI class provides a user interface for managing gym courses.
DatabaseInitializer
 
DatabaseUtil
 
EnrollmentException
Exception related to enrollment operations in the gym manager application.
EnrollmentException.DuplicateEnrollmentException
Thrown when a member is already enrolled in a course.
EnrollmentException.EnrollmentNotAllowedException
Thrown when enrollment is not allowed for the member.
EnrollmentRepository
Interface for managing enrollments in gym courses.
EnrollmentRepositoryImpl
Implementation of the EnrollmentRepository interface for managing enrollments in gym courses.
EnrollmentService
Interface for managing enrollments in gym courses.
EnrollmentServiceImpl
Implementation of the EnrollmentService interface.
GymApp
GymApp is the main entry point for the Gym Manager application.
GymCourse
Represents a gym course with its details.
Member
Represents a gym course with its details.
MemberException
Exception related to member operations in the gym manager application.
MemberException.DuplicateMemberException
Thrown when a duplicate member is detected.
MemberException.InvalidMemberDataException
Thrown when invalid data is provided for a member.
MemberException.MemberNotFoundException
Thrown when a member with the specified ID is not found.
MemberRepository
Interface for managing members in the gym repository.
MemberRepositoryImpl
Implementation of the EnrollmentRepository interface for managing enrollments in gym courses.
MemberService
Interface for managing enrollments in gym courses.
MemberServiceImpl
Implementation of the MemberService interface for managing gym members.
MemberUI
MemberUI class provides a user interface for managing gym members.
Person
Represents a gym course with its details.
ServiceException
Base exception for service layer errors in the gym manager application.
